RoomGenerator

Class RoomCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomGenerator.RoomCluster

  • public class RoomCluster
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for RoomGenerator. A RoomCluster is a room that we are looking at splitting in half with either a horizontal or vertical hallway. Holds the cluster's dimensions and whether it will get a horizontal or vertical hallway.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean giveHorizontalWall
      Will the cluster recieve a horizontal or vertical hallway to partition it?
      (package private) int height
      The height.
      (package private) int width
      The width.
      (package private) int x
      The top left most x value in the room cluster.
      (package private) int y
      The top left most y value in the room cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new room cluster.
